channel.title: 码 链 - nmnlist
channel.description: 每个人眼中，都是不同的世界 –柯宝！!

item.title: nmnlist
item.description:
This is an inverted colors (white on black) variant of the mnmlist theme.

Settings

There's one additional setting used by this theme, if present:

HIDE_DATE = False

If HIDE_DATE is set to True, dates won't be displayed under the blog post titles.

Compass
